20.eng-name: Tribute, Spoils, and Rulership (Kitab Al-Kharaj, Wal-Fai' Wal-Imarah)

hadiths.text: Ibn ‘Awn said “I asked Muhammad about the portion of the prophet(ﷺ) and safi. He replied “A portion was taken for him along with the Muslims, even if he did not attend (the battle) and safi (special portion) was taken from the fifth before everything.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي سَهْمِ الصَّفِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: The Special Portion (As-Safi) Of The Prophet (ﷺ) That Was taken From The Spoils Of War
